diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $LJ$ is $12$ units.
The length of line $JM$ is equal to the length of line $LM$.
Point $K$ lies on the line segment $JL$.
line_instances: There are lines $JK$, $JL$, $KL$, forming a triangle $JKL$.
There are lines $MJ$, $MK$, $ML$, forming a triangle $JMK$.
